綠.definition: green; (slang) (derived from 綠帽子|绿帽子[lu:4 mao4 zi5]) to cheat on (one's spouse or boyfriend or girlfriend)

綠化.definition: to make green with plants; to reforest; (Internet slang) Islamization

綠卡.definition: permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)

綠喉太陽鳥.definition: (bird species of China) green-tailed sunbird (Aethopyga nipalensis)

綠喉蜂虎.definition: (bird species of China) Asian green bee-eater (Merops orientalis)

綠嘴地鵑.definition: (bird species of China) green-billed malkoha (Phaenicophaeus tristis)

綠園.definition: Lüyuan district of Changchun city 長春市|长春市[Chang2 chun1 shi4], Jilin

綠園區.definition: Lüyuan district of Changchun city 長春市|长春市[Chang2 chun1 shi4], Jilin

綠地.definition: green area (e.g. urban park or garden)

綠壩.definition: Green Dam, content-control software, in use during 2009-2010 (abbr. for 綠壩·花季護航|绿坝·花季护航[Lu:4 ba4 · Hua1 ji4 Hu4 hang2])

綠壩·花季護航.pinyin: lǜ bà · huā jì hù háng
綠壩·花季護航.definition: Green Dam Youth Escort, Internet content-control software, in use during 2009-2010 (abbr. to 綠壩|绿坝[Lu:4 ba4])

綠女紅男.definition: young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)

綠孔雀.definition: (bird species of China) green peafowl (Pavo muticus)

綠寬嘴鶇.definition: (bird species of China) green cochoa (Cochoa viridis)

綠尾虹雉.definition: (bird species of China) Chinese monal (Lophophorus lhuysii)

綠島.definition: Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

綠島鄉.definition: Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

綠帽子.definition: green hat (figuratively, a symbol of being a cuckold)

綠旗兵.definition: same as 綠營|绿营[lu:4 ying2], Green standard army, standing infantry during Qing dynasty, originally formed from Ming and other Chinese army units

綠春.definition: Lüchun county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan

綠春縣.definition: Lüxi county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan

綠林.definition: place in Hubei, the starting point for a major rebellion at the end of Western Han; also pr. [Lu:4 lin2]

綠林好漢.definition: (idiom) chivalrous hero, often one who combats injustice or fights for a noble cause (originally referred to a group of outlaws who assembled in 綠林|绿林[Lu4lin2])

綠林豪客.definition: see 綠林好漢|绿林好汉[lu4lin2-hao3han4]

綠樹成蔭.definition: (idiom) (of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage; (of a road) to be tree-lined

綠燈.definition: green light (traffic signal); (fig.) permission to proceed

綠營.definition: Green Standard Army, standing infantry during Qing dynasty, originally formed from Ming and other Chinese army units

綠營兵.definition: Green standard army, standing infantry during Qing dynasty, originally formed from Ming and other Chinese army units

綠皇鳩.definition: (bird species of China) green imperial pigeon (Ducula aenea)

綠皮書.definition: green paper (government report proposing policies and inviting discussion)

綠皮車.definition: green train (slow, noisy, unairconditioned train with forest green livery and yellow trim that ran on the Chinese railway system from the 1950s, phased out in the early 21st century)

綠盤.definition: (of a stock price or market index) currently lower than at the previous day's close

綠翅短腳鵯.definition: (bird species of China) mountain bulbul (Ixos mcclellandii)

綠翅金鳩.definition: (bird species of China) common emerald dove (Chalcophaps indica)

綠翅鴨.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian teal (Anas crecca)

綠背姬鶲.definition: (bird species of China) green-backed flycatcher (Ficedula elisae)

綠背山雀.definition: (bird species of China) green-backed tit (Parus monticolus)

綠背林鶲.definition: (bird species of China) fulvous-chested jungle flycatcher (Rhinomyias olivacea)

綠胸八色鶇.definition: (bird species of China) western hooded pitta (Pitta sordida)

綠腳山鷓鴣.definition: (bird species of China) green-legged partridge (Arborophila chloropus)

綠色食品.definition: clean, unadulterated food product; organic food

綠茶.definition: green tea; (slang) (of a girl) seemingly innocent and charming but actually calculating and manipulative; a girl who has these qualities

綠茶婊.definition: "green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative

綠草如茵.definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on

綠葉.definition: green leaf; (fig.) actor playing a supporting role

綠豆凸.definition: see 綠豆椪|绿豆椪[lu:4 dou4 peng4]

綠豆椪.definition: mung bean cake (pastry with a rounded top, containing a sweet or savory filling made with cooked mung beans)

綠頭巾.definition: green turban (figuratively, a symbol of being a cuckold)

綠鷺.definition: (bird species of China) striated heron (Butorides striata)
